messages.title: Working Hard
messages.content: Bob Rudd is working hard in the Garden Quarter.

messages.title: My pledge to you
messages.content: A Labour council will introduce the Cheshire West Street Care Pledge to look after our environment, reduce litter and promote recycling.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will abolish Police and Crime Commissioners and introduce a new position of Commissioner that gives a policing commitment to local people.
Will freeze energy prices until 2017 and introduce a new and fair tax system.
Proposes measures to progress local planning and to regenerate the city centre and other areas that are important community assets.
Will not allow the culling of badgers and will protect the environment by halting development on green landscapes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving young people the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will support all schools to maintain or achieve Outstanding Ofsted reports and ensure teachers are qualified.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Four ways to end the housing crisis
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will scrap the 'bedroom tax' and build 200,000 homes per year.

issues.health: Will repeal the Health and Social Care Act and provide GP services within 48 hours.

housing.content: Will scrap the 'bedroom tax' and build 200,000 homes per year.
